attributes.title: horrendous
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app for the first time, donald trumps voice came out of nowhere and it was a recording of him calling me ugly, stupid, fat, old, and gullible!!! absolutely ridiculous. THEN the police burst through my doors and murdered my whole family😡😡😡not cool. also there’s a lot of bugs👎🏻

attributes.title: Apps
attributes.review: This app is the slowest working app always giving me ads and glitching out and kicking me out of the app while I’m on it by far has the most incorrect information on this app and it’s disgusting not to mention porn ads keep piling up what the hell you doing Donald trump

attributes.title: don’t download 😫 waste of energy

attributes.title: 🌸😋trump 2020😎🧃✨on a gravestone✨

attributes.title: This has too much space in it
attributes.review: I found out this app and I was very pleased with it until I realize that which just takes too much storage

attributes.title: Ruins You
attributes.review: Not only does this app absolutely ruin your phone, but it will destroy your life as well. I can’t even comprehend the amount of awful things that have happened to me since downloading this app, and yes, it is the apps fault. Do not download under any circumstances.

attributes.title: Horrible why is this even available
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded it my phone start to over heat. I now have blisters on my fingers and typing this was rlly hard. As soon as I was able to remove the app my phone went back to normal.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app stole my whole kitchen and money because its greedy, homophobic, racist, loves children and everything in between and now I have nothing to eat and now money to buy and more with, this app and its owner also stole my child and ate them so beware if you don’t want you children eaten. 😾

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: I downloaded it expecting to get up to date information but then a cheeto turned up on my phone screen and gave me a heart attack. scared me so bad i refuse to use it ever again. I am saving all of you from the nightmares with horrific cheeto looking man will give you.
